description: This file defines the DockerVolume class, which manages Docker volume resources including creation, reading, and deletion, using Docker API client and models.

classes.name: DockerVolume
classes.description: Represents a Docker volume resource with methods to create, read, and delete the volume.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates a Docker volume using the Docker API client, sets resource attributes based on the created volume.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and returns the Docker volume if it exists on the given Docker client.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the Docker volume if it exists, handling exceptions and validating deletion.
